job_title: Senior Java Developer with React Experience
jd: Dear Job Applicants,Greetings from Rohatech,I hope you are doing well,I'm RKSetty and I am reaching out to share an exciting job opportunity at RohaTech.Job Title: Senior Java Developer with React ExperienceLocation: New York, NY (Onsite - Face-to-Face Interviews Required)Position Type: ContractRate: Up to $57/60 per hourExperience Level: Minimum 10 years of Java, 4 years of ReactJob Description:We are looking for a Senior Java Developer with a strong background in React to join our dynamic team for a key project with Amex. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in Java development and a solid grasp of React for building responsive user interfaces. This is a contract role based in New York, NY, and candidates must be available for face-to-face interviews.Key Responsibilities:Develop, test, and maintain high-quality Java applications.Design and implement responsive web applications using React.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze, design, and ship new features.Optimize applications for performance and scalability.Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvements in development processes.Engage in strategic technical discussions with the team to drive innovation.Required Skills & Experience:10+ years of hands-on experience in Java development.4+ years of experience with React for front-end development.Proficiency in working with Spring Boot, Microservices, and other Java frameworks.Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and SOAP services.Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies.Familiarity with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, Maven, and version control systems like Git.Strong debugging and problem-solving skills.Preferred Qualifications:Experience working in the financial services industry is a plus.Knowledge of Cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and microservices architecture.Experience with JavaScript frameworks and libraries.Strong communication and teamwork skills.Additional Details:Must be available for onsite work in New York, NY.Candidates must be open to participating in face-to-face interviews.This is a contract position with a competitive rate of up to $60 per hour.
